column4: how about a device that has passwords generated via satellite, and updated every 2 minutes
, already have a few of those

mk.  I just figure that they are better than just storing your passes on a flash drive.  You thought it would make it so that only the holder of the drive could use it, but thats not true.  Its still anyone who knows the pass, flash in hand or not

sure, lol. I've decided its easier just to remember a sentance and change it once a week or something. like 'clowns have fangs during the night'  then ' sunset comes just after sunrise' could be the week after'
